verbs.description: JUBA , South Sudan ( AP ) — [ARG0: South Sudan 's government] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: lashed] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARG1: at the United States] [ARGM-TMP: after the Trump administration threatened to cut off hundreds of millions of dollars]

JUBA , South Sudan ( AP ) — South Sudan 's government on Wednesday lashed out at the United States after [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to cut off hundreds of millions of dollars]
